webpage:
Publications
We're trying to gather all the publications related to Swarm in a bibliographic database. Please do send us your references! E-mail them to swarm@swarm.org.
Here we've collected as many citations to research using Swarm (either explicitly or implicitly) that we know about. Please let us know if you have a paper by e-mailing: swarm@swarm.org. There's also a list of references to Swarm in the general media, that may also be of interest.
The previous generation of this database used BibTeX, but we have now moved to the DocBook XML/SGML format. Here is the database. The database is also available in a printed format, as detailed below.
&pubs; &media;
